message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our negotiation, I can't go lower than $12,500.  It's still a great deal for you, and it allows me to meet my own needs. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $12,200. This is my final offer before I consider purchasing the product from another seller.
